stories.text:
I recently[0] asked whether HN used feature flags with their teams, turns out quite a few of us do!

Most of the use cases discussed seemed to be around separating deployments from releases, so I'm curious: does your team use feature flags for A/B testing?

[0]: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30114856
stories.title: Ask HN: Does your team use feature flags for A/B testing?

stories.text:
Having just written a Wikipedia article myself and waiting for the 'up to 3 month' period for it to be reviewed and published, I am wondering if others here have done the same.

Disclaimer: I am a regular donor to Wikimedia
stories.title: Have you authored an original Wikipedia article? What is it about?
